name: Norilsk
description: Norilsk is an adult orientated Visual Novel. It centers around a main character who can pursue up to 4 different love interests (3 different girls or 1 guy.) At the end of the common route you can choose who you want to date.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit) Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL capable GPU DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 560 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
